nodes.text: Terin Vollen was a male freighter pilot and husband to Nyreen Vollen. Terin disappeared sometime during the Clone Wars and Nyreen, hoping to find out what happened to him, agreed to transport Advanced Recon Commando Sull off Gaftikar upon the request of Null-class Advanced Recon Commando A'den Skirata in exchange for information on Terin. She was later informed that Terin died while traveling in space.
